channel.title: If the npc is walking away then the char will stand there and not attack
channel.description: How would I go about fixing the aforementioned in the title?

item.title: If the npc is walking away then the char will stand there and not attack
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I think your server may lack chasing. Attack an NPC from afar and see if you move towards them. If you don’t then you need to make it so if the position check (being within range) fails then your player moves to the npc. If you server doesn’t lack it then your ‘chase’ may be reset when the npc moves for whatever reason; look through your NPC handler to understand how this actually works.

Read full topic
item.source: If the npc is walking away then the char will stand there and not attack
